name: ETH Global Paris
description: Paris, the city of lights and the birthplace of revolutions, is at the forefront of Web3 innovation. This July, a global community of developers, designers, creators, and thinkers committed to shaping the decentralized future are coming together for ETHGlobal Paris - a hackathon weekend to foster creativity and collaboration on the Ethereum ecosystem, bringing together builders from all around the globe.Here at the beautiful Palais Brongniart, hackers can attend talks and workshops, receive valuable feedback from the leading teams

name: ETH Mexico
description: ETHMexico is an event bringing together some of the top minds and experts in Ethereum and ETHGlobal's return to Latin America.

name: ETH Global Istanbul
description: Join us in Istanbul May 26thâ€“28th for a weekend hackathon like no other. Get hype to build the future of web3 with thousands of developers and creatives in one.

name: Pragma New York
description: Pragma New York is an event bringing together some of the top minds and experts in Ethereum and ETHGlobal's return to in-person hackathons since 2020.

name: ETH Milan
description: EthMilan is the largest Web3 conference in Milan that will take place on October 5-6 2023 at Palazzo delle Stelline.

name: Token2049
description: The Premier Crypto Event in Asia. We bring together the leading voices in crypto.
